name: Maiden

skills.name: Icy Temper
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 25% chance of placing a [Freeze] debuff for 1 turn.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +5%

skills.name: Diminish
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Decreases the target's MAX HP by 25% of the damage inflicted.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +5%
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Sow Confusion
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Places a 30% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns. Places a 30% [Decrease DEF] debuff on all enemies for 2 turns if this attack is critical.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1
